body: Japanese make good stuff, but as a people they are weak. Look at what they self-insert into, bland MCs or big fat ugly bastards. And all the chicks in anime/hentai are the ones who are bold, and forward. Hikkikomori's hold on to this idea that this is the way the real world works until they hit 30 and realize it's too late for them to ever catch up. Then comes the noose.
